survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of remote team onboarding processes within organizations.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your organization's remote onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better granularity in responses. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your organization's remote onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding activities did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections. Include 'Other' option with text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-ended option for 'Other'.

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during your remote onboarding?
